name: Plane Shift
components: V, S, F (a forked metal rod attuned to the plane of travel)
target: creature touched, or up to eight willing creatures joining hands
text: You move yourself or some other creature to another plane of existence or alternate dimension. If several willing persons link hands in a circle, as many as eight can be affected by the plane shift at the same time. Precise accuracy as to a particular arrival location on the intended plane is nigh impossible. From the Material Plane, you can reach any other plane, though you appear 5 to 500 miles (5d%) from your intended destination. Plane shift transports creatures instantaneously and then ends. The creatures need to find other means if they are to travel back (including casting plane shift again).
mythicText:
If you’ve been to the destination plane and are familiar with a location there, you may choose that location and arrive on target at that location with anyone else you transport with the spell.

Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, you grant transported creatures the effects of a planar adaptation spell (Advanced Player’s Guide 236) upon arrival, lasting for 1 hour.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 器材 (调整成将要前往的位面的分叉金属杆)
target_zh: 接触到的生物, 或者至多8个手拉手的自愿生物
text_zh: 你将自己或其他生物移动到另一个位面或其他次元。如果多个自愿的人手拉手连成一个环形，那么一个异界传送可以同时影响最多八个人。要精准地抵达位面的某一地点几乎完全不可能。从主物质位面出发，你可以抵达任何其他位面，但是你出现的地点距离你想去的目的地会有5英里到500英里 (5d%) 的误差。异界传送会立即将生物传送，然后法术就结束了。要想返回，生物需要另寻他途 (包括再次施放异界传送)。
mythicText_zh:
如果你曾经到过目标位面，并且熟悉（familiar）在那里的一处地点，那么你可以选择该地点，并且与任何你使用该法术传送的人一同抵达目标地点。

强化：若你花费2次神话之力，那么你能够使被传送的生物在抵达后获得位面适应（Planar Adaptation）的效果，持续1小时。
